## title: Vendors batch access request window 
## slug: domum-vendors-batch-access-request-window 
## seoTitle: Vendors batch import window 
## description:  
## contentType: Markdown 
## Metadata_End
This article describes the fields in the batch access request window for Domum RemoteAccess. For more details, see the documentation on  or .

## 


## Step 1 - General

This step presents the following fields:

| Item            | Description                                               |
| --------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
|           | The system fills in the field automatically.               |
| *  | Required field. Provide space for inserting free text with justification. |
| *         | Required field. Features a retractable menu for choosing a registered reason. |
|  | Optional field. Provides space for recording the governance code, if applicable. |
|             | Button to proceed to the next step.                         |

## Step 2 - Devices

This step presents the following fields:

| Item       | Description                                               |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Opens a window with the list of devices available for access. |
|    | Button to go back to the previous step.                   |
|        | Button to proceed to the next step.                        |

## Step 3 - Credentials

This step presents the following fields:

| Item       | Description                                               |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Opens a menu with the list of credentials available for access. |
|    | Button to go back to the previous step.                   |
|        | Button to go to the next stage.                            |


The section only displays credentials related to previously selected devices.

## Step 4 - Access Restriction

This step presents the following fields:

| Item                       | Description                                               |
| -------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
|    | Section for specifying the start and duration of access.   |
|      | Section for specifying the days of the week on which access will be available. |
|     | Section to specify the times when access will be available. In addition to the predefined options, it is possible to customize a time window for access. |
|                    | Field for specifying a limit on the number of sessions.    |
|                    | Button to go back to the previous step.                   |
|                        | Button to proceed to the next step.                        |

## Step 5 - Review

This step presents the following fields:

| Item     | Description                                               |
| -------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
|     | The screen presents a summary of all configured settings.  |
|  | Button to go back to the previous step.                   |
|      | Button to save the defined settings and request access.   |
